direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods modify the map by adding or removing entries, and involve updating the expiration map.
Both methods involve clearing or removing entries from the map and the expiration map.
The remove method can be substituted by removeIfExpired when checking for expired entries before removal.
Both methods handle the removal of entries based on expiration times, with similar exception handling logic.
Both methods access the map and the expiration map to determine the presence or removal of entries.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the initialization of the expiration map for proper operation.
The remove method should be invoked after checking if the entry is expired using removeIfExpired.
Both methods verify the removal of entries and handle similar exceptions related to missing entries.
